data.author: Abhinav Upadhyay
data.title: Are Function Calls Still Slow in Python? An Analysis of Recent Optimizations in CPython
data.description: How costly it is to call functions and builtins in your python code? Does inlining help? How have the recent CPython releases improved performance in these areas?
